heisig_chinese_memo: The firehouse's engines in this country have a lustrous jade color.
Ru_trainchinese: yíng: (графема) (книжн.) блеск драгоценных камней; блестящий, сверкающий
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: My precious jade (green gemstone) is so lustrous (smooth/bright/glowy) that I hide it in my greenhouse to keep it safe.  It blends in with the green plants.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " Jade " to " Ying ", the sound is saved, indicating a beautiful stone that is as smooth as jade. "Poetry‧Weifeng‧Qiao": "There are gangsters and gentlemen, who are full of ears and ears." Mao Chuan: "Xin, Ying, and beautiful stone."

" Ying " can mean jade color is bright and clean. "Said Wen": "The color of jade. From jade, the sound of luminescence. One said: stone is second to jade. "The Analects of Confucius" said: like jade is ying." Volume four of "Han Shiwai Zhuan": "Good Pearl Although there are hundreds of thousands of water, it can’t hide its radiance.”

" Ying " also means smooth and transparent. Tang Yang Juyuan "The Story of Li Mo Playing the Flute·Xu Yunfeng": "When the clouds are in the sky, the sky is bright, and the autumn leaves are cold."

" Ying " also implies purity of heart. Tang Qianqi, "Shan Zhai Sitting Alone at Xi Xuan Master Xi Zhi": "Hearty red lotus water, forget the green tea cup."

" Ying " also means grinding and curing. "Zhou Shu·Su Chuo Biography": "The husband Liang jade is not carved, it is similar to the stone; the name Ji is not chi, and it is mixed with the horse. It is carved and shining, and you try it, the jade is straight, and then begins Minute."

" Ying " also refers to decoration and finishing. The Southern Song Dynasty Liu Yiqing's "New Words of the World: Elimination": "Wang Junfu has the ox name "Babailizhang", and his hoof horns are always Ying."
humanum_short_description_en: From " Jade " to " Ying ", the sound is saved, indicating a beautiful stone that is as smooth as jade.
humanum_full_description:
從「玉」，「熒」省聲，表示光潔似玉的美石。《詩‧衛風‧淇奧》：「有匪君子，充耳琇瑩。」毛傳：「琇、瑩，美石也。」

　　「瑩」可表示玉色光潔。《說文》：「玉色。从玉，熒省聲。一曰：石之次玉者。《逸論語》曰：如玉之瑩。」 《韓詩外傳》卷四：「良珠度寸，雖有百仞之水，不能掩其瑩。」

　　「瑩」也表示光潔透明。唐楊巨源《李謨吹笛記‧許雲封》：「時雲天初瑩，秋露凝冷。」

　　「瑩」還引申為心地純凈。唐錢起〈山齋獨坐喜玄上人夕至〉：「心瑩紅蓮水，言忘綠茗杯。」

　　「瑩」亦表示磨治。《周書‧蘇綽傳》：「夫良玉未刻，與瓦石相類；名驥未馳，與駑馬相雜。及其刻而瑩之，馳而試之，玉石駑驥，然後始分。」

　　「瑩」還指裝飾、塗飾。南朝宋劉義慶《世說新語‧汰侈》：「王君夫有牛名八百里駮，常瑩其蹄角。」
humanum_short_description: 從「玉」，「熒」省聲，表示光潔似玉的美石。

Chinese Definition:
Ideographic: Fiery 火 like a gem 玉
Chinese: The firehouse's engines in this country have a lustrous jade color.
Meaning: lustrous
Hanzi: 莹
Story: My precious jade (green gemstone) is so lustrous (smooth/bright/glowy) that I hide it in my greenhouse to keep it safe. It blends in with the green plants.
Kind: traditional

從「 玉 」，「 熒 」省聲，表示光潔似玉的美石。《詩‧衛風‧淇奧》：「有匪君子，充耳琇瑩。」毛傳：「琇、瑩，美石也。」 「 瑩 」可表示玉色光潔。《說文》：「玉色。从玉，熒省聲。一曰：石之次玉者。《逸論語》曰：如玉之瑩。」 《韓詩外傳》卷四：「良珠度寸，雖有百仞之水，不能掩其瑩。」 「 瑩 」也表示光潔透明。唐楊巨源《李謨吹笛記‧許雲封》：「時雲天初瑩，秋露凝冷。」 「 瑩 」還引申為心地純凈。唐錢起〈山齋獨坐喜玄上人夕至〉：「心瑩紅蓮水，言忘綠茗杯。」 「 瑩 」亦表示磨治。《周書‧蘇綽傳》：「夫良玉未刻，與瓦石相類；名驥未馳，與駑馬相雜。及其刻而瑩之，馳而試之，玉石駑驥，然後始分。」 「 瑩 」還指裝飾、塗飾。南朝宋劉義慶《世說新語‧汰侈》：「王君夫有牛名八百里駮，常瑩其蹄角。」
From " Jade" to " Ying", the sound is saved, indicating a beautiful stone that is as smooth as jade. "Poetry‧Weifeng‧Qiao": "There are gangsters and gentlemen, who are full of ears and ears." Mao Chuan: "Xin, Ying, and beautiful stone." " Ying" can mean jade color is bright and clean. "Said Wen": "The color of jade. From jade, the sound of luminescence. One said: stone is second to jade. "The Analects of Confucius" said: like jade is ying." Volume four of "Han Shiwai Zhuan": "Good Pearl Although there are hundreds of thousands of water, it can’t hide its radiance.” " Ying" also means smooth and transparent. Tang Yang Juyuan "The Story of Li Mo Playing the Flute·Xu Yunfeng": "When the clouds are in the sky, the sky is bright, and the autumn leaves are cold." " Ying" also implies purity of heart. Tang Qianqi, "Shan Zhai Sitting Alone at Xi Xuan Master Xi Zhi": "Hearty red lotus water, forget the green tea cup." " Ying" also means grinding and curing. "Zhou Shu·Su Chuo Biography": "The husband Liang jade is not carved, it is similar to the stone; the name Ji is not chi, and it is mixed with the horse. It is carved and shining, and you try it, the jade is straight, and then begins Minute." " Ying" also refers to decoration and finishing. The Southern Song Dynasty Liu Yiqing's "New Words of the World: Elimination": "Wang Junfu has the ox name "Babailizhang", and his hoof horns are always Ying."

瑩字的基本解释

瑩
yíng
见“莹”。

瑩
yǐng
〔听瑩〕疑惑。

瑩字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yíng］
［《廣韻》永兵切，平庚，云。］
［《廣韻》烏定切，去徑，影。］
“莹1”的繁体字。
(1)光洁似玉的美石。
(2)珠玉的光采。
(3)光洁透明。
(4)引申为心地纯净。
(5)使明洁。
(6)使明白。
(7)闪烁。
(8)磨治。
(9)装饰；涂饰。
(10)见“瑩嫇”。
(11)通“熒”。眩惑。
(12)通“熒”。微光。参见“瑩然”。

瑩字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　瑩； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页739第08
【廣韻】永兵切【集韻】【正韻】于平切【韻會】于營切，?音榮。【廣韻】玉色。　又【集韻】石似玉。【詩·衞風】充耳琇瑩。【傳】琇瑩，美石也。【詩·齊風】尚之以瓊瑩乎而。【傳】瓊瑩，石似玉。【韻會】詩詁曰淇奧詩：充耳琇瑩。註：毛云：琇瑩，美石也。詩：尚之以瓊華，尚之以瓊英，尚之以瓊瑩。註：毛云：瓊英，石似玉。鄭云：石似瓊，似瑩。今詳琇瑩與琇實同文，瓊瑩與瓊英瓊華同文，則瑩非玉石矣。毛說非也。况瓊旣爲玉之美，瑩又爲次玉之石，則一瑱乃似二物，鄭說非也。凡玉之生，以及其成，有榮有英，有華有實，猶草木也。瑩卽榮也，謂玉之始生，如草木之榮也。英謂一玉之中最美者，如草木之英華。謂玉之方成，如草木之英華。實謂玉之旣成，如草木之實，皆可用之玉也。　又明也。【揚子·太?經】一生一死，性命瑩矣。【註】瑩，明也。　又六瑩，樂名。【列子·周穆王篇】奏承雲六瑩九韶晨露以樂之。　又人名。【前漢·功臣表】祝兹侯呂瑩。【註】師古曰：瑩，音榮。又烏暝反。　又凋也。【楚辭·九思】堇荼茂兮

Traditional characters for "莹1".
(1) A beautiful stone that is as smooth as jade.
(2) The brilliance of jewels.
(3) Smooth and transparent.
(4) The extension is pure heart.
(5) Make bright and clean.
(6) Make it clear.
(7) Flashing.
(8) Grinding.
(9) Decoration; finishing.
(10) See "Ying Mao".
(11) Connect "Ying". Dizzy.
(12) Connect "Ying". Shimmer. See "Ying Ran".
Ying
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Jade Character Department] 　ying; Kangxi strokes: 15; page number: page 739 08
[Guang Yun] Yong Bing cut [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] Yu Ping cut [Yun Hui] Yu Ying cut,? Yin Rong. [Guangyun] Jade color.　[Jiyun] Stone is like jade. 【Poetry·Weifeng】Enjoy your ears. [Biography] Xiu Ying, Mei Shi Ye. 【Poetry·Qifeng】Shangzhi is based on Qiongying. [Biography] Qiongying, stone like jade. 【Rhyme】The poem said Qi'ao poems: full of ears and ears. Note: Mao Yun: Xiuying, Meishi. Poetry: It is in Qionghua, Qiongying, and Qiongying. Note: Mao Yun: Qiongying, Shi is like jade. Zheng Yun: Shi is like Qiong and Ying. Today, Xiuying and Xiongshi have the same text, and Qiongying has the same text as Qiongying and Qionghua, so Ying is not jade. Mao said no. The situation is that Qiongchang is the beauty of jade, and Ying is the stone of second jade, so one thing is like two things, so Zheng said it was wrong. Where jade is born, and its success, there is glory and heroism, and there is beauty and solidity, and it is just like grass and trees. Ying Yurong is also the birthplace of jade, just like the glory of vegetation. Britain is said to be the most beautiful in a jade, like the yinghua of plants and trees. It is said that the Fangcheng of jade is like the Yinghua of the grass and trees. In fact, it is said that jade is perfect, like the real plants and trees, all jade can be used.　You Ming Ye. [Yangtze·Tai? Classic] One death in a lifetime, life is shining. [Note] Ying, Ming Ye.　 Liuying again, music name. 【Liezi·Zhou Muwang Chapter】Playing Chengyun Liuying Nine Shao Morning Dew for joy.　Another name. [Former Han Dynasty Heroes] Zhu Zihou Luying. [Note] Shi Gu said: Ying, Yinrong. Wu Ming turned back again.　Withered again. [Songs of Chu·Nine Thoughts] Jin Tu Maoxi
